QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Centipede
QAPair.Answer: This article describes the effects of a centipede bite. This article is for information only. DO NOT use it to treat or manage an actual poisoning from a centipede bite. If you or someone you are with has an exposure, call the local emergency number (such as 911), or the local poison control center can be reached directly by calling the national toll-free Poison Help hotline (1-800-222-1222) from anywhere in the United States.
